PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-06332015-05-28DFO,  ,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectAquatic Invasive Species Regulations
PrecisAQUATIC INVASIVE SPECIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) prevent the introduction and spread of aquatic invasive species in Canadian waters; (2) avoid costs associated with the establishment of invasive species; (3) support management activities to control the spread of aquatic invasive species once introduced into Canada, including efforts to eradicate aquatic invasive species where feasible, by providing a targeted, national regulatory tool that allows the authorization of these activities under the Fisheries Act; and (4) fill regulatory gaps, and ensure a consistent national strategy for the management of Aquatic invasive species.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0121 Publication Date: 2015-06-17
